models.name: todo_list_app_users
models.description: User accounts for the Todo List Application, storing authentication data including email, password hash, email verification status, and timestamps. This entity represents individual users who own todo items. The table supports soft deletion for account recovery and provides audit fields for tracking creation and modification times. Email is unique allowing identification and login. Relates to todo_list_app_todo_items for ownership of tasks.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User's unique email address used for login and identity verification.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for user authentication, never store plain text passwords.

plainFields.name: email_verified
plainFields.description: Flag indicating whether the user's email address has been verified.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was soft deleted, if applicable.

models.name: todo_list_app_todo_items
models.description: Represents individual todo items created and managed by users in the todo list application. Each item is tied exclusively to one user, with a status indicating completion state and timestamps for creation and last update. This model enables users to independently create, view, update, and delete their tasks while enforcing ownership and access control. It references the users table for ownership association.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Task description text. Non-empty string up to 256 characters, validated by application logic.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Task completion status, only 'pending' or 'done' values allowed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was last updated.
